com.sc.hm.otl.core.ctx

Class OTLContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sc.hm.otl.core.ctx.OTLContext

  • public final class OTLContext
extends Object
    This class hides and serves as a substitute for the underlying thread context implementation of any provider.

    If the underlying logging provider the feature of storing contextual information of a thread, this class, will delegate all the calls to the underlying system's thread context. It accomplishes the same with the help of ContextAdapter. If the associated framework provides an adapter then the same will be loaded by the provider library. If no adapter is found, then the default NoOpContextAdapter will be used.

    Thus, as a context user, one can take advantage of thread context in the presence of any logging framework.

    Please note that all methods in this class are static.

    Author:
    Sudiptasish Chanda

      Get the context value as identified by the key parameter.

      Put a context value as identified with the key parameter into the current thread's diagnostic context map.
      static void remove(String key)

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public static void put(String key,
                       String val)
        Put a context value as identified with the key parameter into the current thread's diagnostic context map. The key parameter cannot be null. The parameter, however, can be null only if the underlying implementation supports it.
        Parameters:
        key - non-null key
        val - value to put in the map
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the "key" parameter is null

      • get

        public static String get(String key)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get the context value as identified by the key parameter. The key parameter cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        key - a key
        Returns:
        the string value identified by the key parameter.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the "key" parameter is null

      • remove

        public static void remove(String key)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Remove the diagnostic context identified by the key parameter from the underlying thread's context.
        Parameters:
        key - a key
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the "key" parameter is null

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear all entries in the MDC of the underlying implementation.
